title: one spacious bedroom, one full bathroom available with nice features
map_address: 1078 North Fairway Drive near North Fairway Drive
posting_body: This beautiful ranch with an open floor plan comes with one spacious bedroom, one full bathroom Plumbing fixtures are in place.
Master suite features a walk in closet and full bath.
The kitchen has a large pantry, as well as newer stainless steel appliances and opens up to the dining area.
Enjoy the sun room with access to the private patio.
Stay warm in the Michigan winters nestled in front of the gas fireplace and cool off in the summer with central air.
Monthly HOA fee includes access to club house, tennis court, lawn service, swimming pool and snow removal.
This house sits on one of the largest lots in the subdivision.
Prime location within 2 minutes to Auburn Hills - short distance to major freeways and Great Lakes Crossing.
This beauty will not last long!
